Extract Data
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Use Real-time or Batch Export API
Alternatives:
  1a. Want to integrate with an ETL
    1a1. Use ETL with REST Adapter
  1b. Want to use Reltio GUI
    1b1. Use Export via MDM UI
  1c. Want to use real-time via Amazon SQS Streaming API
    1c1. Use Amazon SQS Streaming API
